mapper.select: select id, test_type, student_type, lecture_type, start_time, end_time from base_coursegroup_timeschedule where test_type = #{test_type} and student_type = #{student_type} and lecture_type = #{lecture_type} order by start_time
mapper.insert: insert into base_coursegroup_timeschedule( created, modified, test_type, student_type, lecture_type, start_time, end_time ) values ( now(), now(), #{test_type}, #{student_type}, #{lecture_type}, #{start_time}, #{end_time} )
